name: LaTeX
postCreateCommand: grep -v PDF /etc/ImageMagick-6/policy.xml > /tmp/policy.xml; sudo rm /etc/ImageMagick-6/policy.xml; sudo mv /tmp/policy.xml /etc/ImageMagick-6/policy.xml; sudo chown -R vscode /workspace; git config --global user.email 'qpfortier@gmail.com'; git config --global user.name 'Quentin Fortier'; git clone git@github.com:fortierq/texmf.git /workspace/texmf; git clone git@github.com:fortierq/tikz /workspace/tikz; git clone git@github.com:fortierq/cpge-exos-info.git /workspace/cpge-exos-info; git clone git@github.com:fortierq/scripts /workspace/scripts
postStartCommand: cd /workspace/texmf; git pull; cd /workspace/tikz; git pull; cd /workspace/cpge-exos-info; git pull; cd /workspace/scripts; git pull
